courseDescription:
This free online course on Getting started with Angular 5 will provide you with an understanding of the structure of Angular 5 and how to use it to code and build a quality web page. You will learn about using the Angular CLI tool to help install Angular and set up a project as well as how to explain the structure and building blocks of Angular. You will also learn about the class file and the template file of a component in Angular.

Furthermore, in this free online course you will be learning how to explain the navigation features of Angular routing and will learn about Angular services such as the getMovies( ) and getCharacters( ) services. Next, will you will be learning about designing stylish web pages that have a functional and user friendly layout. The course will also teach you about the three type of directives: directives with templates, students directives, and attributes directives. By studying this online course, you will be introduced to the pipes and how they can deliver a better UI.

Finally, this Angular 5 online course wraps up with the Angular forms where you will learn about the reactive forms and template-driven forms. Get started this online course today and learn to code a web page with Angular 5.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Angular 5 Update, students will go over the various course objectives and have an overview of what will go into learning about Angular. This module will breakdown how this course works and what students can expect. The module will go over many of the various updates that are new to Angular 5.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Let's Get Started, students will learn about using the Angular CLI tool to help install Angular and set up a project. It will also go over how the Angular CLI tool can help do some heavy lifting when coding a project in Angular. Students will gain an understanding of the structure and building blocks of Angular.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Angular Component, students will learn about the many components of Angular. Students will learn about the application structure of Angular and how it can be viewed as a component tree. The module breaks down the class file and template file of a component. The module will then provide a demonstration.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Angular Routing, students will learn about the navigation features of Angular routing. The module will show students how to implement routes like URL links. Students will also learn how to do this securely. Students will learn about the included services such as router module in this module.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Angular Services, students will learn about services. The module starts by breaking down the structure of a service. The module then covers the getMovies( ) and getCharacters( ) services, how to add them to their respective list components and how to properly execute them with a lifecycle event in Angular.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Angular Modules, students will learn about the different classes of Angular Modules. Students will learn about the properties of a module including declarations, exports, and imports. This topic will also cover the different types of view classes for a module, like components, directives, and pipes.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Styling Angular, students will learn about Material Components. Students will lean how to use these components for the purpose of styling an designing web-pages that work on desktop and mobile. They will used these tools to design a page that looks good while having a functional layout.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Directives and Pipes, students will learn about directives and pipes, and how they both relate to components. Students will learn about the three type of directives, directives with templates, students directives, and attributes directives. This module will also provide an introduction to pipes and how they can deliver a better UI.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Angular Forms, students will learn about how forms work in Angular. Students will learn about approaching forms in Angular in two different ways. This module will also introduce students to the Angular Forms Module. Students will also learn about reactive forms and template-driven forms.

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, Course Conclusion, the course concludes with a quick summary and review of the course before the final assessment.
